article.headline: VMI 68, Winthrop 61
article.story: LEXINGTON, Va. (AP) -- Radee Skipworth scored 17 of his game-high 26 points in the second half on Saturday to lead VMI to a 68-61 win over Winthrop. After falling behind by nine in the second half, the Keydets (5-14, 3-6 Big South Conference) used a 23-5 run capped by a Richard Little free throw to take a 61-50 lead with 3:55 remaining. Marcus Cooke made a layup to cap a 6-0 spurt that gave the Eagles (11-10, 5-5) a 46-37 lead with 11:22 remaining. Matt Murrer had 12 points and Sam Mielnik scored 10 for the Keydets, who shot 53.3 percent compared to 41.8 percent for Winthrop. Tyrone Walker had 21 points to pace the Eagles, who led at the half 28-24. Cooke added 15.
